resources.string: %s is a decentralized end-to-end-encrypted chat app that uses the Signal protocol for encryption.
You don\'t need to register anywhere to get started – in the next step you will specify your relay server to get started with receiving messages.

You need a relay server to receive messages. 
If you skip this step, you will only be able to send messages, but not receive them. 

Are you sure you want to skip setting up your relay server? 

You can configure your relay server later in the settings.
Enter your relay server address below. \n \nThe relay server has been set up either by you or by someone you trust.

You are using this relay server for the first time. 
A password has been generated for you to use in the future. 
Make sure you keep this password safe and secure as you will need it in case you reinstall the app or delete its data. 
It's recommended to store it in a password manager 

Do not share this password with anyone otherwise they will be able to send messages and manage your relay server on your behalf!
Long-press on the password to copy it to the clipboard.
Store it in a secure place and keep it safe.
This relay server has already been set up and thus you need to provide the password that was provided to you during the initial setup.
If you don\'t know the password, you have to reset your relay server to get provided a new password.
